title: Independence of Pakistan
description: Pakistan emerges as an independent state on 14 August; Karachi becomes the capital.
impact: A new nation is born on the global stage.

title: Quaid-e-Azam Passes Away
description: Muhammad Ali Jinnah, the founder of Pakistan, dies on 11 September.
impact: The loss of a founding father and visionary leader.

title: First Constitution & Republic
description: Pakistan adopts its first constitution; becomes the Islamic Republic of Pakistan (23 March).
impact: Formalization of the state's legal and political identity.

title: Indo–Pak War
description: A major war with India over Kashmir; ceasefire via Tashkent Declaration (1966).
impact: A defining conflict that shaped regional dynamics.

title: Separation of East Pakistan
description: After civil war and Indo–Pak conflict, East Pakistan becomes Bangladesh (16 Dec).
impact: The most significant geopolitical event in the nation's history.

title: 1973 Constitution
description: A consensus constitution establishing a parliamentary system, still foundational today.
impact: A framework for governance that has endured for decades.

title: Islamic Summit in Lahore
description: Historic OIC summit hosted by Pakistan strengthens ties across the Muslim world.
impact: A moment of global diplomacy and unity.

title: Benazir Bhutto Becomes PM
description: First woman elected to lead a Muslim-majority nation.
impact: A landmark moment for democracy and women's rights.

title: Nuclear Tests at Chagai
description: Pakistan conducts nuclear tests (28 & 30 May), declaring itself a nuclear power.
impact: A shift in the balance of power in South Asia.

title: Kashmir Earthquake
description: A 7.6 magnitude earthquake devastates northern Pakistan on 8 October.
impact: A natural disaster that united the nation in a spirit of resilience.

title: Historic Floods
description: Catastrophic monsoon floods impact millions, prompting global relief efforts.
impact: A stark reminder of the country's vulnerability to climate change.

title: National Action Plan & Security Gains
description: Counter-terror operations intensify; security landscape gradually improves.
impact: A collective effort to restore peace and stability.

title: General Elections
description: PTI forms federal government; political landscape shifts.
impact: A major change in political leadership and national policy.

title: Political Transition
description: No-confidence vote leads to change of government; economic headwinds intensify.
impact: A period of political instability and economic uncertainty.

title: Climate & Economic Challenges
description: Rebuilding after 2022 floods; ongoing IMF program and reforms.
impact: The ongoing struggle to manage economic and environmental crises.

title: Elections & Coalition Government
description: Post-election coalition forms at the center; economic stabilization efforts continue.
impact: A new political alignment to tackle pressing national issues.

title: Centennial Preparations
description: Nationwide projects and commemorations for approaching 100 years of independence.
impact: Looking forward to a century of independence and progress.
